item.title: Zettelkasten
item.description: [[Zettelkasten]] is a German word for “slip box”, the phrase was coined by [[Niklas Luhmann]] who was a prolific social scientist in Germany, he published 50 books and over 600 articles in his lifetime, his work was the result of his note-taking and writing system Zettelkasten, it is the equivalent of [[Hypertext]] that we use every day on the internet.
